description.en:
Polypulsar is a yield farming platform with PvE and PvP games. The platform aims to integrate block chains games with yield farming to offer a different yield farming experience. 

Users can yield farm and play games with their earnings to try and get extra rewards, or sell them for a profit. Players are rewarded with native tokens as well as USDC each day if they are in top 20. 

The ultimate goal of the project involves creating an MMORPG game with a sandbox ecosystem.
